requeuedStep.solutionRequeued:
**Functional Purpose**: Heading indicating a solution has been requeued
**UI Location**: Finish Mentor Discussion Modal → Requeued Step (heading)
**When Users See This**: When a student's solution is requeued after a mentor discussion
**Technical Context**: Standard text; no special formatting
**Current English**: "Your solution has been requeued."
requeuedStep.requedExplanation:
**Functional Purpose**: Explanation for a requeued solution
**UI Location**: Finish Mentor Discussion Modal → Requeued Step (paragraph)
**When Users See This**: When a student's solution is requeued after a mentor discussion
**Technical Context**: Standard text; no special formatting
**Current English**: "Your solution has been put back in the queue and another mentor will hopefully pick it up soon. We hope you have a positive mentoring session on this solution next time!"
requeuedStep.goToSolution:
**Functional Purpose**: Button to navigate back to the solution
**UI Location**: Finish Mentor Discussion Modal → Requeued Step (button)
**When Users See This**: After their solution has been requeued
**Technical Context**: Standard button text; no special formatting
**Current English**: "Go back to your solution"
testimonialField.writeTestimonial:
**Functional Purpose**: Placeholder text for a testimonial input field
**UI Location**: Finish Mentor Discussion Modal → Testimonial Step (textarea placeholder)
**When Users See This**: When providing a testimonial for a mentor discussion
**Technical Context**: Placeholder text for a textarea element
**Current English**: "Write your testimonial here"
testimonialField.minimum:
**Functional Purpose**: Label indicating the minimum character count for a testimonial
**UI Location**: Finish Mentor Discussion Modal → Testimonial Step (character counter)
**When Users See This**: When typing a testimonial, visible below the textarea
**Technical Context**: This string follows a number indicating the minimum length. `{min}` must remain unchanged.
**Current English**: "minimum"
unhappyStep.thankYouForReport:
**Functional Purpose**: Heading for a successful report submission
**UI Location**: Finish Mentor Discussion Modal → Unhappy Step (heading, when report is true)
**When Users See This**: When a student has submitted a report about a mentor discussion
**Technical Context**: Standard text; no special formatting
**Current English**: "Thank you for your report"
unhappyStep.reportExplanation:
**Functional Purpose**: Explanation after a report has been submitted
**UI Location**: Finish Mentor Discussion Modal → Unhappy Step (paragraph, when report is true)
**When Users See This**: When a student has submitted a report about a mentor discussion
**Technical Context**: Standard text; no special formatting
**Current English**: "Thanks for letting us know. We will look into your report and get back to you in the next few days. In the meantime we hope you have a better next experience."
unhappyStep.solutionRequeued:
**Functional Purpose**: Heading indicating a solution has been requeued after an unhappy experience
**UI Location**: Finish Mentor Discussion Modal → Unhappy Step (heading, when requeue is true)
**When Users See This**: When a student chooses to requeue their solution after an unhappy mentor discussion
**Technical Context**: Standard text; no special formatting
**Current English**: "Your solution has been be requeued"
unhappyStep.requeueExplanation:
**Functional Purpose**: Explanation for a requeued solution after an unhappy experience
**UI Location**: Finish Mentor Discussion Modal → Unhappy Step (paragraph, when requeue is true)
**When Users See This**: When a student chooses to requeue their solution after an unhappy mentor discussion
**Technical Context**: Standard text; no special formatting
**Current English**: "Your solution has been put back in the queue and another mentor will hopefully pick it up soon. We hope you have a positive mentoring session on this solution next time!"
unhappyStep.hopeBetterExperience:
**Functional Purpose**: Heading for a general message after an unhappy experience
**UI Location**: Finish Mentor Discussion Modal → Unhappy Step (heading, default)
**When Users See This**: When a student finishes an unhappy mentor discussion without reporting or requeuing
**Technical Context**: Standard text; no special formatting
**Current English**: "We hope you have a better next experience"
unhappyStep.sorryExplanation:
**Functional Purpose**: General explanation after an unhappy experience
**UI Location**: Finish Mentor Discussion Modal → Unhappy Step (paragraph, default)
**When Users See This**: When a student finishes an unhappy mentor discussion without reporting or requeuing
**Technical Context**: Standard text; no special formatting
**Current English**: "Sorry this experience wasn't great. We hope the next one will be better."
unhappyStep.goToSolution:
**Functional Purpose**: Button to navigate back to the solution
**UI Location**: Finish Mentor Discussion Modal → Unhappy Step (button)
**When Users See This**: After an unhappy mentor discussion outcome
**Technical Context**: Standard button text; no special formatting
**Current English**: "Go back to your solution"
